ayas.text: waṭ ṭūr
wakitābin masṭūr
fī raqqin manshūr
wal baytil ma`mūr
was saqfil marfū`
wal baḥril masjūr
inna `adhāba rabbika lawāqi`
mā lahu min dāfi`
yawma tamūrus samā-u mawrā
watasīrul jibālu sayrā
fawaylun yawma-idhin lil-mukadhhibīn
alladhīna hum fī khawḍiy yal`abūn
yawma yuda``ūna ilā nāri jahannama da``ā
hādhihin nārul latī kuntum bihā tukadhhibūn
afasiḥrun hādhā am antum lā tubṣirūn
iṣ-lawhā faṣbirū aw lā taṣbirū sawā-un `alaykum ۖ innamā tujzawna mā kuntum ta`malūn
innal muttaqīna fī jannātin wana`īm
fākihīna bimā ātāhum rabbuhum wawaqāhum rabbuhum `adhābal jaḥīm
kulū washrabū hanī-an bimā kuntum ta`malūn
muttaki-īna `alā sururin maṣfūfah ۖ wazawwajnāhum biḥūrin `īn
wal ladhīna āmanū wattaba`at-hum dhurriyyatuhum bi-iymānin alḥaqnā bihim dhurriyyatahum wa mā alatnāhum min `amalihim min shay-ī ۚ kullum-ri-in bimā kasaba rahīn
wa-amdadnāhum bifākihatin walaḥmin mimmā yashtahūn
yatanāza`ūna fīhā ka-sal lā laghwun fīhā walā ta-thīm
wayaṭūfu `alayhim ghil-mānul lahum ka-annahum lu-lu-un maknūn
wa-aqbala ba`ḍuhum `alā ba`ḍiy yatasā-alūn
qālū innā kunnā qablu fī ahlinā mushfiqīn
famannallāhu `alaynā wawaqānā `adhābas samūm
innā kunnā min qablu nad`ūh ۖ innahu huwal barrur raḥīm
fadhakkir famā anta bini`mati rabbika bikāhinin walā majnūn
am yaqūlūna shā`irun natarabbaṣu bihi raybal manūn
qul tarabbaṣū fa-innī ma`akum minal mutarabbiṣīn
am ta-muruhum aḥlāmuhum bihādhā ۚ am hum qawmun ṭāghūn
am yaqūlūna taqawwalah ۚ bal lā yu-minūn
falya-tū biḥadīthin mithlihi in kānū ṣādiqīn
am khuliqū min ghayri shay-in am humul khāliqūn
am khalaqus samāwāti wal-arḍ ۚ bal lā yūqinūn
am `indahum khazā-inu rabbika am humul musayṭirūn
am lahum sullamun yastami`ūna fīh ۖ falya-ti mustami`uhum bisulṭānin mubīn
am lahul banātu walakumul banūn
am tas-aluhum ajran fahum min maghramin muthqalūn
am `indahumul ghaybu fahum yaktubūn
am yurīdūna kaydā ۖ fal ladhīna kafarū humul makīdūn
am lahum ilāhun ghayrullāh ۚ subḥānallāhi `ammā yushrikūn
wa in yaraw kisfan minas samā-i sāqiṭan yaqūlū saḥābun markūm
fadharhum ḥattā yulāqū yawmahumul ladhī fīhi yuṣ`aqūn
yawma lā yughnī `anhum kayduhum shay-an walā hum yunṣarūn
wa inna lilladhīna ẓalamū `adhāban dūna dhālika walākinna aktharahum lā ya`lamūn
waṣbir liḥukmi rabbika fa-innaka bi-a`yuninā ۖ wasabbiḥ biḥamdi rabbika ḥīna taqūm
wa minal layli fasabbiḥ-hu wa idbāran nujūm
